titleStmt.title: The English opera, or, The vocal musick in Psyche with the instrumental therein intermix'd : to which is adjoyned the instrumental musick in The tempest / by Matthew Lock ...
Psyche. Vocal score
titleStmt.author: Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.
Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692. Psyche.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Ratcliff and N. Thompson for the author, and are to be sold by John Carr at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: The text is from Shadwell's tragedy, Psyche.
